caption.p: Sensitivity tests of pan-CoV assay using serial dilutions of RNA and plasmid containing RdRp sequences of coronaviruses. (A) Sensitivity of pan-CoV assay using SARS-CoV plasmid. (B) Sensitivity of pan-CoV assay using mers-CoV plasmid. (C) Sensitivity of pan-CoV assay using SARS-CoV-2 RNA. The left and right sides of the DNA ladder are the results of first and second step of pan-CoV assay, respectively.
